LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipNuzzleMtbHours: Set the nuzzle interval for this animal Negative values disables nuzzling Postiive values set the mean time in hours before an animal will nuzzle colonists when tamed
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMinNuzzleMtbHours: Lowest allowed nuzzle interval for all animals Negative values disable nuzzling for all animals Positive values set a lower limit for the nuzzle interval
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMaxNuzzleMtbHours: Highest allowed nuzzle interval for all animals Negative values set the nuzzle interval to unlimited (allowing for nuzzling to be disabled) Positive values enable nuzzling for all animals and set an upper limit for the nuzzle interval
